section_title.title:
4 Steps to Earn the Honour CFDR
Certification from courses
section_title.subtitle: Make it #VetsWhoCode

items.title: Register for a CFDR preliminary categorized class
items.description: CFDR preliminary classes whose names are ended with "101CF". Finishing these classes will bring you the basic knowledge and skills.

items.title: Finished all obligatory subjects in CFDR program
items.description: Learners have to finish these subjects within the period of 3 years. Early completion will reward them with a faster certifying process.

items.title: Submit all essential documents & related proof of completion
items.description: We need to verify your participation in all subjects included and collect all the scores as well as assessment to grade your certificate.

items.title: Receive printed certification via postal & e-version via emails
items.description: We'll send your certificate by postal line in one week after the verification process and also email an electronic version to your inbox.
